source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video starts with an extreme wide shot, where a skateboarder is positioned in the center-right of the frame in the middle ground, with a large building occupying the background. The camera pans left and zooms in, tracking the skateboarder as he moves across a plaza from right to left. The shot transitions into a medium full shot, bringing the subject into the foreground as he approaches a low, dark stone ledge. He jumps over the ledge, which is in the immediate foreground, and lands on the sidewalk below. During the landing, the skateboarder remains in the center of the frame in the foreground, with a street containing active traffic now visible in the background. The camera, positioned at the subject's level, continues to pan left, following him as he skates away toward the left side of the frame.
